text: Timothy E. Kraft (born April 10, 1941) is a retired Democratic political consultant. He is best known as the campaign manager for the unsuccessful reelection bid of U.S. President Jimmy Carter. He was born in Noblesville, Indiana. In September 1980, only weeks before the general election, he stepped down after it his cocaine was discovered. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Jimmy Carter Category:American political commentators Category:Politicians from Indiana Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Timothy Kraft
